mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM crm_demo_phone_type t1 where t1.enabled=1 and t1.apply_end_date>#{applyEndDate}

SELECT t1.*, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct t2.NAME) AS productTypeNames FROM crm_demo_phone_type t1 LEFT JOIN crm_product_type t2 ON t1.id = t2.demo_phone_type_id WHERE t1.enabled = 1
AND t1.name LIKE concat('%',#{p.name},'%')
GROUP BY t1.id
